attributes.action: Remove Sadiq Khan as London Mayor he has failed us miserably.
attributes.additional_details: Since May 9th 2016 Sadiq Khan has been in London Mayor in this time we have seen a rise in Knife crime, Homelessness has risen and now he is failing miserably with the fight against Coronavirus by reducing the train service so now the people who have to travel are crowded and not looking after the public transport workers who have not received the right PPE or by having their buses cleanup a suitable standard to protect them!
attributes.background: Remove Sadiq Khan as London Mayor he has failed us miserably. It’s time for a change

rejection.details: The Mayor of London is elected by the people of London, not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
